con:testCase.name: CreditorUpdate_NationalID_IBAN
con:testCase.con:description:
CreditorUpdate Request for IBAN Account
Description related to Steps :
DB Properties : Database connection string for different environments Properties : Test Data for Predefined API's to ferform action DB Connection : Set the connection string based on the environment selected to execute

con:request.name: Authorization
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:authorization:v1_3"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bankId>${Properties#orgid}</urn2:bankId> <urn2:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerID> <urn2:productID>10</urn2:productID> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:migrationDate>2018-03-05+05:00</urn2:migrationDate> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn2:corporateGrouping> <urn2:customerId>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerId> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:parentAgreementId>1234567</urn2:parentAgreementId> <urn2:b2bPollingEnabled>false</urn2:b2bPollingEnabled> </urn2:corporateGrouping> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:agreementAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>0</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:psd2Configuration>BOTH</urn2:psd2Configuration> <urn2:access>CREDIT_AND_DEBIT</urn2:access> </urn2:agreementAccount> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:sessionID>${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0,30)}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>TestCorpFirst</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>TestCorpLast</urn2:lastName> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> <urn2:approvalLimit>10000</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>10000</urn2:registerLimit> </urn2:userAccount> </urn2:userData> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CreditorCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorCreateRequest> <urn:creditorInformation> <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <urn1:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn1:currencyCode> <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount> <urn1:creditor> <urn2:name>Creditor</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditor> <urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>Test</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>Test</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>Test</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>1234</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>91052</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Erlangen</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Test9</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn1:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditorAgent> <urn1:supplierNumber>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn1:supplierNumber> </urn:creditorInformation> </urn:CreditorCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:xpath: declare namespace ns1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns1:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns1:predefinedCreditorState[1]
declare namespace ns1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns1:CreditorCreateResponse[1]/ns1:predefinedCreditorId[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/@fetchSize
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/@rowNumber
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/AGENTID[1]

//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/OTHERIDENTIFICATION[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/NAME[1]

con:request.name: CreditorUpdate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorUpdateRequest> <urn:creditorInformation> <urn1:alias>INT Creditor</urn1:alias> <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <urn1:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn1:currencyCode> <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount> <urn1:creditor> <urn2:name>Creditor</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditor> <urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>Test</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>Test</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>Test</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>1234</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>91052</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Erlangen</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Test9</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn1:creditorAgent> <urn2:nationalId>${Properties#UpdateNationalID}</urn2:nationalId> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditorAgent> <urn1:supplierNumber>${Properties#supplierNumber}</urn1:supplierNumber> </urn:creditorInformation> <urn:predefinedCreditorId>${Properties#predefinedCreditorId}</urn:predefinedCreditorId> </urn:CreditorUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:xpath: declare namespace ns1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns1:CreditorUpdateResponse[1]/ns1:predefinedCreditorState[1]
declare namespace ns1='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1'; //ns1:CreditorUpdateResponse[1]/ns1:predefinedCreditorId[1]
